author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IONA EXPECTED TO BECOME A MAJOR HURRICANE ON TUESDAY...
summary: ...IONA EXPECTED TO BECOME A MAJOR HURRICANE ON TUESDAY... As of 5:00 PM HST Mon Jul 28 the center of Iona was located near 10.9, -152.2 with movement W at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 985 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...IONA EXPECTED TO BECOME A MAJOR HURRICANE ON TUESDAY... As of 5:00 PM HST Mon Jul 28 the center of Iona was located near 10.9, -152.2 with movement W at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 985 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Iona (CP1/CP012025)
